posts.post_content:
I think Ash Zealot is mad because she took a wrong turn somewhere between Phyrexia and Innistrad, causing her to overshoot the Innistrad block entirely. Now she's stuck in Ravnica, breaking Golgari face because she has nothing better to do while waiting for the printing of more flashback spells.  
  
So mad that she will punch the back of your head if she catches you trying to flashback your own cards or sneak in a [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler). She doesn't pick favorites. Now cast your spells from your hand like good little planeswalker. You still hungry for a second serving of that spell? She'll feed you her mace instead, you glutton.
posts.html:
I think Ash Zealot is mad because she took a wrong turn somewhere between Phyrexia and Innistrad, causing her to overshoot the Innistrad block entirely. Now she's stuck in Ravnica, breaking Golgari face because she has nothing better to do while waiting for the printing of more flashback spells.

So mad that she will punch the back of your head if she catches you trying to flashback your own cards or sneak in a Gravecrawler. She doesn't pick favorites. Now cast your spells from your hand like good little planeswalker. You still hungry for a second serving of that spell? She'll feed you her mace instead, you glutton.
